Even though my encode is a lot smaller my screens are bigger because they got more details.
See lower part of left hand from gentleman in suit with gray hair.
In the second picture see bottom part left on the wood CHD encode got some red that doesn't belong there.

hoops, sorry, CHD links were supposed to be  
http://someimage.com/YsDX59R

Hello Highcode I have a request for future rips: Please include any audio commentary tracks. You can encode them at really low bitrates if space is a concern but they'd be really nice to have. Thanks.
